川普一上台，就大砍对国际人权事业的支持

https://www.humanrightsfirst.org/press-release/human-rights-advocates-respond-trump-budget-proposal

WASHINGTON – The Trump Administration on Monday released its federal budget proposal, detailing the funding requests the administration made to Congress for fiscal year 2021. Human Rights First found that the president’s proposal takes the United States backward on human rights, particularly when it comes to American leadership abroad and U.S. treatment of those seeking asylum.

"This budget request makes clear that the Trump administration’s only real foreign policy goal is the withdrawal of American leadership from the international stage,” said Human Rights First Senior Vice President for Policy, Rob Bershinski.
......
Human Rights First also found that the president proposed cuts of more than $1 billion for overseas humanitarian aid and assistance to refugees.
